src_original: so 'pi dvividho draṣṭavyaḥ- bāhyaścādhyātmikaśca /
tgt_original: 一外、二內。

src_original: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ?
tgt_original: 其外因緣從因義。 何者？

src_original: yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ,  aṅkurāt patram,  patrāt kāṇḍam,  kāṇḍānnālam,  nālādgaṇḍaḥ,  gaṇḍādgarbham,  śūkāt puṣpam,
tgt_original: 一切過去未來諸佛種智，同說如是，以從種生芽、從芽生葉、從葉生節、從節生莖、從莖生幹、從幹生枝、從枝生蕚、從蕚生花、從花生子。

src_original: puṣpāt phalamiti /  asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati,  yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
tgt_original: 若無子則不生芽，如是無花則不生子。

src_original: sati tu bīje aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /  evaṃ yāvat sati puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 有子故得生芽，如是有花故得生子。

src_original: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahamaṅkuramabhinirvartayāmīti /  aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /  evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti,  phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartitamiti /  atha punarbīje sati aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 如此，子亦不言我能生芽、芽亦不言我能自生，如是一切法如理而安。

src_original: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /  evaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 以是義故，外因緣從因義，應如是觀，此是觀因義。

src_original: kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ?
tgt_original: 觀緣義者何！

src_original: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 其地性者，能受種子。

src_original: abdhāturbījaṃ snehayati /  tejodhāturbījaṃ paripācayati /  vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati /
tgt_original: 水性者，能潤種子。 火性者，能熟種子。 風性者，能增長種子。

src_original: ākāśadhāturbījasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 空性者，能為種子作無礙。

src_original: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karoti /  asatsu eṣu pratyayeṣu bījādaṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirna bhavati /  yadā bāhyaśca pṛthivīdhāturavikalo bhavati,  evamaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātavaśca avikalā bhavanti,  tadā sarveṣāṃ (Bcp 270)
tgt_original: 若離此緣則種子不生，如地性能受種子、水性能潤種子、火性能熟種子、風性能增長種子、空性能無礙種子，賴時節故種子增長，種子增長故生芽。

src_original: samavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /  tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti /  evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti /  aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
tgt_original: 其地性者亦不言我能受種子、水性者亦不言我能潤種子、火性者亦不言我能熟種子、空性者亦不言我能為種子作無礙、種子亦不念言我藉此等緣能得增長。

src_original: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 若離此緣，種子則不能生芽。

src_original: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ  pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 其此芽亦非自作、亦非共作、亦非自在天作、亦非無因生，皆從地水火風空種子時節故生芽。

src_original: evaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //  tatra bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ?  na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /  kathaṃ na śāśvatat iti?  yasmādanyo 'ṅkuro 'nyadvījam,  na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
tgt_original: 此外因緣應作五事觀察：

src_original: tatra avidyā katamā?
tgt_original: 云何名無明？

src_original: eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
tgt_original: 所言無明者，依六種性稱為男女。 何者為六種性？ 如是地性、水性、火性、風性、空性、識性。 其地性者，堅相，能成身、使身不敗。

src_original: iyamucyate 'vidyā /
tgt_original: 如是等類種種無知，稱為無明。

src_original: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
tgt_original: 有此無明故，於境則生愛著、則生瞋恚、則生癡。

src_original: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu,  amī avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iutyucyante /
tgt_original: 此等貪瞋癡依境故起，則稱為行。

src_original: vastuprativijñaptirvijñānam /
tgt_original: 隨事分別，故名為識。

src_original: catvāri mahābhūtāni copādāya rūpamaikadhyarūpam /  vijñānasahajāścatvāro 'rūpiṇa upādānaskandhā nāma,  nāmarūpasaṃniśritāni indriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam /
tgt_original: 從此識故復生四陰，即是名色。 依名色故有諸根，以此稱為六入。

src_original: nāmarūpavivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante,  tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamucyate /
tgt_original: 名色增長故，有六門作所應作等知智，名色緣故稱為六入。

src_original: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante /  ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ityucyate /
tgt_original: 六觸入故生六觸，緣此六入故稱為觸。

src_original: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /  iyaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanetyucyate /  yastāṃ vedayati,  abhinandayati,  adhyavasyati,  adhitiṣṭhati,
tgt_original: 此觸生故故生受，故稱緣觸生受，領取諸緣味著故名受。

src_original: sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate /  āsvadanā, abhinandanā,  adhyavasāyasthānam,  ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,  idaṃ tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 緣受故稱為愛，歡悅耽著好色染味名色不能捨離，深更貪求此等，稱為愛。 緣愛故取，欲更希求後有，因身口意業故，稱取緣有。

src_original: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,  sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate /  tatkarmanirjātānāṃ pañcaskandhānāmabhinirvṛttiryā,  sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate /
tgt_original: 依業故生陰，此是緣有故生。

src_original: yā (yo) jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayaparipākādvināśo bhavati,  tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate /
tgt_original: 此陰生起故有熟壞，故稱生緣老死。

src_original: tatra vijñānaṃ bījasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  karma kṣetrasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 無明、愛、業、識也。 其識種子有，為因其名色者，業及田為因，無明愛為煩惱因。

src_original: karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ saṃjanayanti /
tgt_original: 無此業煩惱故，識種子不生長。

src_original: tatra karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti /  tṛṣṇā vijñānabījaṃ snehayati /  avidyā vijñānabījamavakirati /
tgt_original: 則此因，業識種子為田，無明故散識種子，愛故潤識種子。

src_original: asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vijñānabījasyābhinirvṛttirna bhavati /  tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi /  (Bcp 226) tṛṣṇāyāṃ api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /  avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /  vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti /
tgt_original: 其無明亦不生念言我能散識種子，愛亦不念言我能潤識種子，業亦不念言我於識為田用，識種子亦不念言我緣此等故生。

src_original: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,  nāmarūpāṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 復次，識種子安住業田中，為愛所潤漬，無明為密覆，故種子生長，生名色芽於一切無生陰。

src_original: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
tgt_original: 則此名色芽，亦非自造、亦非他造、亦非俱造、亦非自在天造、亦非無因生。

src_original: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ  vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati
tgt_original: 有如上業煩惱故，識種子增長生名色芽，亦不從此世度於後世而有，隨從業果因緣備足故。

src_original: na tatra kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ saṃkrāmati /  asti ca karmaphalam,
tgt_original: 如是此身於此處滅、於彼處生，有業因緣隨逐備足故。

src_original: asti ca vijñaptiḥ,  hetupratyayānā mavaikalyāt /  peyālaṃ /
tgt_original: 譬如月輪於三萬二千由旬形現於此，以鉢盛水覩見月形，月亦不從空墜落於此，亦不度來而有月形像，因緣具故。

src_original: yathā agnirupādānavaikalyānna jvalati,  upādānāvaikalyācca jvalati,
tgt_original: 譬如持火以密器盛貯，火然不滅，焰亦不離焰去，隨因故然。

src_original: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ
tgt_original: 如是業煩惱生識種子，從此生入相續，生名色芽於無主法，因緣具故如是。

src_original: evamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //  tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 我藉此等緣所生。 若有此緣則生眼識。 如是耳鼻舌身意識，如理廣如是說。

src_original: na śāśvatataḥ,  nocchedataḥ,  na saṃkrāntitaḥ,  parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ,  tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
tgt_original: 非常、非斷、非傳度、藉緣故果實增廣、從相似生。
